title: Abduction 1975 (Crime, Thriller) They turned her body and her mind against her!

sources.title: Abduction 1975 (Crime, Thriller) They turned her body and her mind against her!
sources.description:
The All-American Girl who became the most wanted woman in America.
Patricia Prescott’s posh life shatters when radicals Frank and Dory snatch her into a high-stakes game of survival, twisting her psyche in a deadly tango of brainwashing and explosive demands. As her father’s empire crumbles, Patricia’s trigger finger switches sides, trading pearls for pyrotechnics in a blaze of rebellion—proving Stockholm’s got nothing on her newfound fury.

Original title: Abduction
Alternative titles: Patricia 

Director: Joseph Zito
Writers: Kent E. Carroll, based on the novel Black Abductor by Harrison James

Main cast:
Judith-Marie Bergan - Patricia Prescott
David Pendleton - Dorian "Dory" Palmer
Gregory Rozakis - Frank Lawson
Leif Erickson - Mr. Prescott
Dorothy Malone - Mrs. Prescott
Lawrence Tierney - FBI Agent
Catherine Lacy - Carol Barley
Presley Caton - Angela "Angie" Ray

Genres: Crime, Drama, Thriller
Release date: October 24, 1975 


00:00 - Full Movie with subtitles
04:21 - Patricia Prescott's privileged life shatters as radicals Frank and Dory execute a brazen daylight abduction.
13:02 - News breaks of Patricia's kidnapping, igniting a media frenzy and Prescott family panic.
16:55 - Captors force Patricia to record a chilling ransom video threatening execution.
36:09 - Patricia's coerced manifesto airs nationwide, exposing Prescott corruption.
54:51 - Stockholm syndrome takes hold as Patricia bonds with captor Carol.
1:14:31 - Radicals detonate Prescott Tower, fulfilling their explosive ultimatum.
1:23:00 - FBI siege erupts in gunfire as Patricia makes a fateful loyalty choice.
1:28:00 - Revolution's aftermath leaves Patricia transformed - hunter becomes hunted.
